subject: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Football
Homosexuality
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Two players in the National Football League, Brendon Ayanbadejo and Chris Kluwe, have lent their support for gay marriage, helping alter the league’s stigma of having a homophobic culture.
snippet: Two players in the National Football League, Brendon Ayanbadejo and Chris Kluwe, have lent their support for gay marriage, helping alter the league’s stigma of having a homophobic culture.
